message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's valued at $150 by many, and I believe it would be a great fit for you. Considering its high value and quality, I am offering it to you today for $120. This is a special introductory price, so don't hesitate to accept if you're interested.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be happy to pay $105 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your interest, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. In order to accommodate your needs while still valuing our product, I propose an offer of $115 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
